titles.title: To amend the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to implement mandatory country of origin labeling requirements for meat and produce on September 30, 2007.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Horticulture and Organic Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

bill.summary:
1/9/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to change the country of origin labeling implementation date from September 30, 2008, to September 30, 2007.
